inputs module¶

class inputs.Inputable(path, inputfile)¶

Bases: object

Inputable class used to load the test table of all specimens as dataframe and the test dataset as well.

Export_inputable(Masterfile)¶
Export_inputable export: dataframe=self.inputable dataframe,

The dataframe isimported to an xls file in order to see and modify it if desired

Import_inputable()¶
Import_inputable import: Materfile to self.inputable,

The excel file is imported to the dataframe attribute self.inputable

Load_data()¶

Initialize: The dataset datframe, load data set into one dataframe even in the case of multiple files and skip headers inside the data set files.

get_inputline()¶
Returns

a serie of relevant information about the specimen, The dataframe is displayed in its dataframe.serie format.

inputs()¶

Extract the key parameters from the excel input file and restructure them into a dataframe.

Initialize: Dataframe [:,14 columns]

set_key()¶
Initialize: self.key,

Get the key name of the specimen from the path/name of the dataset file.

The key name allow the access to the input parameters in the input excel file: (e.g “Probenbezeichnung” in the excel file “Versuchstabelle_LCF”)
